#Text=Caribou plays the Bowery Ballroom
#Text=Tuesday , November 6 , 2007
#Text=Daniel Snaith , better known as Caribou , formerly known as Manitoba until a lawsuit by musician Richard " Handsome Dick " Manitoba , recently played New York City 's Bowery Ballroom .

column1: #Text=Below is Wikinews reporter David Shankbone 's conversation with the electronica pioneer .
#Text=How is the tour going ?
#Text=It ’s been really good so far .
#Text=We started with a few festivals in Europe and then did a month around the UK , Germany and France .
#Text=Over here we just did Canada and this is the start of a big tour for us around the States .
#Text=Then Europe for another month .
#Text=It ’s pretty full on , but I love playing shows .
#Text=How do European and American audiences compare to each other ?
#Text=I get asked that all the time and I feel people are expecting some kind of an answer like we are better received in Europe , and I do n’t know if people expect that of an electronic musician .
#Text=But they are more electronic in Europe than they are here , right ?
#Text=Maybe , but my experience is that people are more similar than different in all the shows , and the reaction is more similar than different .
#Text=You reach the same fans in each place ?
#Text=Yeah people are so connected to the interests that they share with other people around the world .
#Text=It ’s not like one place is completely different from another anymore .
#Text=Do you play to larger audiences over there or here ?
#Text=It ’s about the same , again .
#Text=When we play in London we play about same size venue and size crowd as we do here .
#Text=Do you have a favorite venue ?
#Text=A few , actually .
#Text=Bowery Ballroom is one of my favorites .
#Text=It 's always awesome .
#Text=The sound is so good here , which is really important .
#Text=It sounds good on stage , which is important for getting into the show .
#Text=We always have really amazing crowds in this place called Richards on Richards in Vancouver .
#Text=This venue in Slovenia we played that is this old commune squat that has lots of gigs and art going over there called the Metalkova .
#Text=The best ones are the surprises we 'll play in a tiny little town in some venue that is like whatever .
#Text=What would be a dream venue to play ?

#Text=Something along the lines of this place we played in the south of France that was this 1920s arts patron villa where Cocteau and all these people lived and worked , and we played just outside there overlooking the French Riviera during this tiny little festival , so those ones are always fun when you just end up at some idyllic spot where they have put together a little festival with great bands .
#Text=Those tend to be in Europe , to be honest .
#Text=The surprise is part of the enjoyment when you arrive and it 's like , this is an insane place to play .
